page.title: 01Area around River Ayr Gorge
page.content: This is a mainly farming area specialising largely in milk production but also producing barley & a few sheep. The area around Coilsholm includes the River Ayr Gorge which is designated by the nature Conservancy Council & the Scottish Wildlife Trust as a "site of special scientific interest". This should ensure the conservation of the richest area of wildlife in Ayrshire which exists as a river gorge with many levels providing habitats for many species of plants & animals. A large part of this area is owned by one landowner, the owner of Barskimming House, which lies to the east of this block & as a result much of the land has remained as deciduous woodland or as small conifer plantations.
